name: QuickJobs
desc: A web page written in NextJs / React that allows us to search for a job for Ecuador between different work areas

name: Tumster
desc: A website where companies can promote their products, increase web visits, build email lists, and grow their audience by creating giveaways

name: FacilTask
desc: A web page where work teams can manage their projects, in addition to being able to organize and collaborate tasks according to the Kanban methodology
